title: Plat Mid/top looking for a team or people to play soloque with
body: Just looking for some fun people to have some fun playing with. I can play seriously or we can all just play some fun ranked ques together. I wont flame and I basically never give up. Lets play and have fun Preferably with people around my age I am 25. :)

replies.body:
Hey LeftyRaydy,
My name is Iris and I’m with Zealous Gaming, a community that’s dedicated to expanding and innovating ourselves everyday by taking the feedback that players like you can give us. I noticed that you’re looking for a server to play with others and I’d like to interest you in our community!
